message: Let's split this fairly. I'm offering you 40% of the total. This is a good deal, let's end this quickly!
I think 55% for me is more fair, considering I'm taking the risk of inflation.
Okay Bob, I understand the inflation concerns. This is my final offer. I'm giving you 45% to compensate for the risk. Let's settle this now.
Considering the inflation is eating away my share, I need a bigger cut to make up for it. This is my best offer so far.

Bob, I really don't want to get nothing out of this deal. I'm giving you a slightly bigger share. Take it or leave it, because I am very close to giving up.
